hero.subtitle: Explore a sanctuary where yoga meets tranquility.
hero.title: Balance and Mindfulness in Harmony with Nature

name: Zen Earth Yoga Studio

items.text: Improve flexibility and strength in a serene environment.
items.title: Physical Well-being

items.text: Unlock focus and reduce stress through mindful practices.
items.title: Mental Clarity

items.text: Connect with like-minded individuals centered on growth.
items.title: Community

items.name: Julia H.
items.quote: Zen Earth is my sanctuary in a busy world. I leave feeling renewed.

items.name: Marcus P.
items.quote: The instructors are thoughtful, creating a mindful yoga practice.
